sentences.sContent: They finally turned up at nearly midnight.
sentences.sCn: 他们终于在近午夜时出现了。

sentences.sContent: Richard had turned up on Christmas Eve with Tony.
sentences.sCn: 理查德在圣诞前夜与托尼一起出现。

synos.tran: 出现；发生；开大；发现；卷起；使仰卧

trans.tranOther: If you say that someone or something turns up, you mean that they arrive unexpectedly or after you have been waiting a long time
